com.psddev.dari.util

Class HtmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugFilter.PageWriter, FormWriter

    public class HtmlWriter
extends Writer
    Writer implementation that adds basic HTML formatting.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.Writer

        protected String escapeHtml(String string)

      • tag

        public HtmlWriter tag(String tag,
             Object... attributes)
               throws IOException
        Writes the given tag with the given attributes.

        This method doesn't keep state, so it should be used with doctype declaration and self-closing tags like img.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • start

        public HtmlWriter start(String tag,
               Object... attributes)
                 throws IOException
        Writes the given start tag with the given attributes.

        This method keeps state, so there should be a matching end() call afterwards.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • end

        public HtmlWriter end()
               throws IOException
        Writes the end tag previously started with start(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...).
        Throws:
        IOException

      • htmlOrDefault
